body:
Hey guys, Porky here. :)

I'm probably coming back to Avicus, so feel free to ask me anything!
body_tagged:
Hey guys, Porky here. :)

I'm probably coming back to Avicus, so feel free to ask me anything!
title: Back to MC / AMA!

replies.body:
WB!!!
You are back! ;D Now let's go with the questions....
Me amas?
Do you have skype?
What is the actual real feel in Celsius in your city?
How are you?
Do you want eat a hot dog with me?
Do you have pet?
Do you like animals like lizards?
Do you even PvP?
Were you moderator on another server?
Do you know how to build a nice map?
Would you like become a moderator again?
What's your city?
Do you like ice cream?
If yes, banana ice cream?
Why did you choose your name?
When were you born?
What is your PC's ram?
Do you like Avicus more than OCN?
Am I asking you too many questions?

replies.body:
@Atdit / ivi
1. Si :D
2. I do :P
3. Around -7
4. Really tired, just came back from my soccer game :o
5. I DO!
6. A parrot <3
7. Nope
8. I do!1!
9. Yep, and I have an interview for MCSG :P
10. Not really, I'm not much of a builder :/
11. I was never one for Avicus, but I probably would want to :)
12. Hint: I live near Gl1tchEE1
13. Loove it
14. Never had it before :o
15. Loooong story :o
16. 361 BC
17. I think 8 gigs
18. I don't even like OCN
19. Sure :D:D
